title: A question.
body:
i just downloaded lol today.
i log in to the game, then i saw that there is no play button on home,
there are some button , home , profile , collection , loot , store.
but there is no play button.
THAN WHERE IS THE PLAY BUTTON?

replies.body: Hey do you mean it's grayed out or completely gone?  If it's missing then there might be an installation issue resulting in bad game files.  See if a force repatch through our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) might help here.
